attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is extremely bad that these schools are teaching children that Muslims worship Satan in secret. I know this because my second cousins go to one of these crazy places. They believe that only they are going to heaven and that everyone else on this world is going to hell because they are part of this church. It is also frustrating to know that in order to become part of this church you have to donate 20% of your income, if you don't, then you go to Hell. Some organisation is profiting from these indoctrinated children. It must be stopped!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
